DPU_RangeProcDSP_HW_Resources_t Struct Reference
rangeProc DPU External Data Structures

RangeProcDSP hardware resources. More...

#include <dpu/rangeproc/rangeprocdsp.h>

Data Fields

DPU_RangeProcDSP_EDMAConfig edmaCfg
 EDMA configuration for rangeProc data Input.
 
cmplx32ImRe_t * dcRangeSigMean
 Pointer to Calibrate DC Range signature buffer The size of the buffer = DPU_RANGEPROC_SIGNATURE_COMP_MAX_BIN_SIZE * numTxAntenna * numRxAntenna * sizeof(cmplx32ImRe_t) byte alignment Requirement = DPU_RANGEPROCDSP_DCRANGESIGMEAN_BYTE_ALIGNMENT_DSP.
 
uint32_t dcRangeSigMeanSize
 DC range calibration scratch buffer size.
 
cmplx16ImRe_t * twiddle16x16
 Scratch buffer pointer for twiddle table for range FFT Size: sizeof(cmplx16ImRe_t) * numRangeBins Byte alignment Requirement = DPU_RANGEPROCDSP_TWIDDLEBUF_BYTE_ALIGNMENT_DSP.
 
uint32_t twiddleSize
 Size of the Scratch buffer for twiddle table.
 
int16_t * window
 Scratch buffer pointer for symmetric window coefficients for range FFT Size: sizeof(int16_t) * numADCSamples / 2 Byte alignment Requirement = DPU_RANGEPROCDSP_WINDOW_BYTE_ALIGNMENT_DSP.
 
uint32_t windowSize
 Size of the Scratch buffer for window coefficients.
 
cmplx16ImRe_t * adcDataIn
 Scratch buffer pointer for ADCbuf input samples Size: 2 * sizeof(cmplx16ImRe_t) * numRangeBins Byte alignment Requirement = DPU_RANGEPROCDSP_ADCDATAIN_BYTE_ALIGNMENT_DSP.
 
uint32_t adcDataInSize
 Size of the Scratch buffer for ADCBuf input.
 
cmplx16ImRe_t * fftOut1D
 Scratch buffer pointer for range FFT output Size: sizeof(cmplx16ImRe_t) * numRangeBins * numRxAntenna * 2 Byte alignment Requirement = DPU_RANGEPROCDSP_FFTOUT_BYTE_ALIGNMENT_DSP.
 
uint32_t fftOut1DSize
 Size of the Scratch buffer for range FFT output.
 
DPIF_RadarCube radarCube
 Pointer to Radar Cube buffer interface.
 

Detailed Description

RangeProcDSP hardware resources.

The structure is used to hold the hardware resources needed for Range FFT
